Path - Class in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes
Represents the geometric shape of a path, which may consist of independent subgraphs.
Path() - Constructor for class org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes.Path
Creates a new empty path with a default winding rule of Path.WIND_NON_ZERO.
Path(int) - Constructor for class org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes.Path
Creates a new empty path with given winding rule.
Path(PathData) - Constructor for class org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes.Path
Creates a path from the given SWT PathData using the default winding rule Path.WIND_NON_ZERO.
Path(PathData, int) - Constructor for class org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes.Path
Creates a path from the given SWT PathData, using the given winding rule.

PointListUtils - Class in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.utils
Common utilities for point manipulations as needed e.g. within Polygon and Polyline.
Polygon - Class in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes
Represents the geometric shape of a convex polygon.

PolynomCalculationUtils - Class in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.utils
Utility class that implements common polynom calculations such as finding the roots of polynoms of degree 2 or 3.

PrecisionUtils - Class in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.utils
A utility class for floating point calculations and comparisons that should guarantee a precision of a given scale, and ignore differences beyond this scale.
